text: Paweł Piotr Kukiz (born 24 June 1963) is a Polish politician, singer and actor. He is the leader of Kukiz'15, a non-partisan political alliance campaigning for single-member districts, and was a candidate in the 2015 presidential election, in which he received 21% of the votes in the first round of the elections, finishing third.Your guide to the 2015 Polish presidential election. In: Krakow Post, 8 May 2015. Since 2015 Kukiz is a member of Polish parliament. He is a co-leader of the Polish Coalition. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:15em;"| Title !
